item.title: By: Are we serious about Democracy? Bojo and Jezzer Need to ally for a sovereign Brexit then duke it out in a General election. #GrubStreet Journal. #WikiBallot #TacticalVoting #SovereignBrexit a scrapbook about the coming Scrap (idiom, brawling) – Not

item.description: […] This Nails it perfectly. I am involved with establishing an open source wiki and decentralised web 3 voting dapp to help localised candidates to get national level office and remain democratically accountable to the people who put them there Canton Direct democracy is what we are calling it with a working title of Magnapedia. https://longhairedmusings.wordpress.com/2019/04/03/cantondd-directdemocracy-sovereignbrexit-magnawik… […]
